invocations.description: Returns the best rune element name for the creature given. If disconsiderdmg is set to true, it'll consider the best rune against the creature given, otherwise it'll consider the best damage based on your level, spell formula and the creature weakness.

Returns the best rune element name for the creature given. If disconsiderdmg is set to true, it'll consider the best rune against the creature given, otherwise it'll consider the best damage based on your level, spell formula and the creature weakness.
